list.name: List Vouchers
list.description: Get a list of all valid vouchers.

create.name: Create Voucher
create.description: Create a new voucher with your own parameters or the default settings of the integration.

number.name: Number of Vouchers
number.description: Specifies how many vouchers are created per call.

quota.name: Quota per Voucher
quota.description: Specifies how often a voucher can be used (0 = unlimited).

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Specifies how long a voucher is valid (in hours) from the time it is entered.

usage_quota.name: Data limit
usage_quota.description: Specifies how much data volume (in MB) is available for the voucher.

rate_max_up.name: Upload bandwidth
rate_max_up.description: Specifies how much upload bandwidth (in kbit/s) is available for the voucher.

rate_max_down.name: Download bandwidth
rate_max_down.description: Specifies how much download bandwidth (in kbit/s) is available for the voucher.

delete.name: Remove Voucher
delete.description: Remove a special voucher or the last created voucher.

id.name: Voucher ID
id.description: ID of the voucher to be deleted.
